snippet: Why Brazil speaks first at the United Nations General Assembly, and how East New York, Brooklyn, and West New York, N.J., got their names.
abstract: FYI column answers questions about why Brazil delivered first address at United Nations General Assembly after its opening in September and how East New York, Brooklyn, and West New York, NJ, acquired their names.
lead_paragraph: Why Brazil speaks first at the United Nations General Assembly, and how East New York, Brooklyn, and West New York, N.J., got their names.

headline.seo: Answers to Questions About New York
headline.main: Answers to Questions About New York
